{"step_by_step_thinking": "The posterior palatal seal is a part of a complete denture that helps to create a seal in the posterior area of the mouth. It also doesn't aid in the insertion and removal of the denture. The posterior palatal seal is not specific to the mandibular denture, it is used in both maxillary and mandibular dentures.
